sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./Product.css" import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Product = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState() const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const productId = useParams().productId const fetchProduct = async () => { setLoading(true) const response = await fetch(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${productId}`) console.log(response) const data = await response.json() setProduct(data) setLoading(false) } useEffect(() => { fetchProduct() }, [productId]) console.log(product) return (
{/* {loading ? "Loading" :

{product.title}

${product.price}
Add To Cart Add To Wishlist
Small Description

{product.description}

Description

{product.description}

} */}
) } export default Product
